箱中气候.content: 想要和丽莎/路易斯一起出去玩躲避球吗？

孑立.encontent: It's okay, it's okay. Let's play together.
孑立.content: 没关系，没关系，让我们一起来玩游戏。

问候.encontent: Are you here for Lisa or Louise (Louise or Lisa)?
问候.content: 你是来找丽莎/路易斯的，还是丽莎/路易斯？

朝晨.encontent:
There are two pats of butter on mommy's pancake. There
 are two glasses of orange juice on the table. Mommy
 is a good mommy. I love my mommy.
朝晨.content:
妈咪的煎饼上有两片黄油，桌上的橙汁有两杯。妈咪是一
个好妈咪，我爱我的妈咪。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Do you want some orange juice? Make it 3 and stay with
 us forever.
信任-朝晨.content: 你想让橙汁变成三杯吗？你可以永远和我们在一起。

夜暮.encontent:
Daddy is home. Sometimes he's home early, sometimes
 late. Most of the time he will bring us gifts. Daddy
 is a good daddy. I love my daddy.
夜暮.content:
爸爸已经到家了。他有时回来得晚，有时回来得早，许多
时候，都会带来礼物。爸爸是一个好爸爸，我爱我的爸爸
。

信任-夜暮.encontent: No, no! I don't want to brush my teeth!

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Scrunchies, clips, golden hair, good daughters, cute
 daughter! Hahaha!
帽檐与发鬓.content: 发带，发卡，金头发，好女儿～可爱的女儿～哈哈哈～

袖与手.encontent: Rock paper scissors! Rock paper scissors! I win!
袖与手.content: 石头，剪刀，布！石头，剪刀，布！我赢啦！

嗜好.encontent:
Alright! There is only one thing I don't like, but
 I can't remember what it is!
嗜好.content:
好吧！我不喜欢的东西只有一点，但我也想不起那是什么
了！

赞赏.encontent:
This little thing is for you. It can move and make
 noises.Squeak! Kiki! Hahahaha!
赞赏.content:
这个小东西送给你。它还会动，也会发声。吱吱！唧唧！哈
哈哈～

亲昵.encontent:
How can people just show up whenever I want to play?Is
 it the same for you?
亲昵.content:
当我想玩游戏的时候，大家自然会来到我身边。你也会这
样吗？

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent: All work, no play, makes Jack a dull boy.
闲谈Ⅰ.content: 只工作，不玩耍，聪明孩子也变傻。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
Dave used to be bad! He is strong, loud and he bullies
 others. But, one day he became a good boy.Now, he
 is our best friend!
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
戴夫惹人讨厌！他力气大，声音响，粗鲁地欺负人。但，有
一天他突然就长成了好男孩。现在，他是我们最好的朋友
！

独白.encontent: I don't want to be alone. Luckily I'm never alone.
独白.content: 我不想独自一个人。还好我从来都不是一个人。

入队.encontent: I wanna go, I wanna go too!

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: Now you have a friend to play with you too!
召唤至终的仪式.content: 现在你也有朋友陪你一起玩啦～
